function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate reporting system for heating, cooling, and ventilation domains.","Impact":"Inability to identify and address issues in these domains, leading to potential health and comfort problems for occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementation of an extensive reporting system and fault detection and diagnostics platform.","Technologies":"Fault detection and diagnostics platform, sub-metering technology.","People":"Occupants and facility managers.","Owner":"Technical managers and facility management team."},{"Description":"Low percentage of sub-metering for loads.","Impact":"Inability to accurately monitor energy usage and identify inefficiencies, leading to higher energy costs and environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Increase the amount of sub-metering to more than 50% of the loads.","Technologies":"Sub-metering technology, energy monitoring systems.","People":"Occupants and facility managers.","Owner":"Technical managers and facility management team."},{"Description":"Lack of fault detection and diagnostics platform.","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and resolving technical issues, leading to potential disruptions in building services and discomfort for occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement a fault detection and diagnostics platform.","Technologies":"Fault detection and diagnostics platform, building automation systems.","People":"Occupants and facility managers.","Owner":"Technical managers and facility management team."}]}
